advanced-features/events-actions.title: Events & Actions
advanced-features/events-actions.description: Master the event system to create responsive, interconnected animations that communicate and coordinate seamlessly. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of events and actions in Animatix Pro.

advanced-features/loops-variables.title: Loops & Variables
advanced-features/loops-variables.description: Master the art of creating dynamic, data-driven animations with loops and variables. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of loop control and variable management in Animatix Pro.

advanced-features/state-management.title: State Management
advanced-features/state-management.description: Master the art of managing complex animation states to create sophisticated, responsive systems. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of state management in Animatix Pro.

advanced-features/triggers-conditions.title: Triggers & Conditions
advanced-features/triggers-conditions.description: Master the art of creating intelligent, responsive animations with advanced triggers and conditions. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of trigger systems and conditional logic in Animatix Pro.

animation-modules/3d-animations.title: 3D Object Animations
animation-modules/3d-animations.description: Learn how to bring 3D objects to life with smooth transformations and cinematic motion.

animation-modules/audio-animations.title: Audio Animations
animation-modules/audio-animations.description: Learn how to synchronize sound with motion for total immersion.

animation-modules/camera-animations.title: Camera Animations
animation-modules/camera-animations.description: Learn about camera animations that create cinematic immersion and smooth scene flow.

animation-modules/material-animations.title: Material Animations
animation-modules/material-animations.description: Learn how to change surface look and feel dynamically to match game events.

animation-modules/particle-systems.title: Particle System Control
animation-modules/particle-systems.description: Learn how to control Unity's particle systems directly through animation nodes.

animation-modules/text-animations.title: Text Animations
animation-modules/text-animations.description: Learn about text animations that make dialogue dynamic, menus expressive, and words memorable.

animation-modules/ui-animations.title: UI Animations

animation-types/3d-object-animations.title: 3D Object Animations
animation-types/3d-object-animations.description: Create stunning 3D object animations that bring your scenes to life. This comprehensive guide covers everything from simple rotations to complex cinematic sequences.

animation-types/audio-animations.title: Audio Animations
animation-types/audio-animations.description: Create immersive audio experiences that enhance your animations with sound effects, music, and dynamic audio. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of audio animation with Animatix Pro.

animation-types/camera-animations.title: Camera Animations
animation-types/camera-animations.description: Master the art of camera animation to create cinematic sequences, smooth transitions, and engaging gameplay experiences. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of camera animation with Animatix Pro.

animation-types/particle-animations.title: Particle Animations
animation-types/particle-animations.description: Create stunning particle effects that bring your scenes to life with fire, smoke, magic, and more. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of particle animation with Animatix Pro.

animation-types/text-animations.title: Text Animations
animation-types/text-animations.description: Create engaging text animations that bring your typography to life. This guide covers everything from simple fade-ins to complex typewriter effects.

animation-types/ui-animations.title: UI Animations
animation-types/ui-animations.description: Create stunning UI animations that enhance user experience and bring your interfaces to life. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of UI animation with Animatix Pro.

api-reference/examples.description: See practical examples of how to use the Animatix Pro API in your projects.

api-reference/overview.title: API Overview for Developers
api-reference/overview.description: Learn about the comprehensive API for runtime control and integration with your game systems.

api/graph-executor-util.title: GraphExecutorUtil
api/graph-executor-util.description: The GraphExecutorUtil class provides static utility methods for controlling Animatix Pro animations programmatically. This is the main API for integrating Animatix Pro with your Unity scripts.

best-practices/mobile-considerations.description: Learn how to optimize Animatix Pro for mobile and WebGL platforms.

best-practices/performance.description: Learn how to optimize your Animatix Pro animations for better performance.

community/contact-support.title: Contact & Support

community/contributing.title: Contributing
community/contributing.description: Help us improve Animatix Pro! This guide explains how you can contribute to the project, whether through code, documentation, examples, or community support.

community/faq.title: FAQ
community/faq.description: Frequently Asked Questions about Animatix Pro. This comprehensive FAQ addresses the most common questions and concerns from users.

community/troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
community/troubleshooting.description: Comprehensive troubleshooting guide for Animatix Pro. This guide helps you diagnose and fix common issues, performance problems, and technical difficulties.

core-concepts/graph-executor.description: Learn how the GraphExecutor reads your graph and executes animations in real time.

developer-guide/custom-conditions.description: Learn how to create custom conditions that extend Animatix Pro's condition system. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of custom condition development.

developer-guide/custom-triggers.description: Learn how to create custom triggers that extend Animatix Pro's trigger system. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of custom trigger development.

developer-guide/runtime-control.description: Master the art of controlling animations at runtime to create dynamic, responsive experiences. This comprehensive guide covers all aspects of runtime animation control in Animatix Pro.

events-actions/actions.description: Learn about action nodes that perform side effects during your animations.

events-actions/conditions.description: Learn about condition nodes that add logic to your animations for decision-based flows.

events-actions/events.description: Learn about event nodes that integrate with Unity's event system for custom events.

events-actions/triggers.description: Learn about trigger nodes that detect when something happens and start animation sequences.

examples/cinematic-camera.description: Complete examples and tutorials for creating cinematic camera animations with Animatix Pro. This comprehensive guide provides ready-to-use examples for professional cinematic sequences.

examples/gameplay-sequences.description: Complete examples and tutorials for creating engaging gameplay animations with Animatix Pro. This comprehensive guide provides ready-to-use examples for common gameplay animation patterns.

examples/ui-ux-animations.description: Complete examples and tutorials for creating stunning UI/UX animations with Animatix Pro. This comprehensive guide provides ready-to-use examples for common UI animation patterns.

examples/vr-ar-mobile.description: Complete examples and tutorials for creating VR/AR and mobile animations with Animatix Pro. This comprehensive guide provides ready-to-use examples for immersive and mobile experiences.

getting-started/first-animation.description: Learn how to create your first animation using Animatix Pro's visual graph editor. This guide will walk you through creating a simple but impressive UI animation.

getting-started/installation.description: Learn how to install and set up Animatix Pro in your Unity project.

getting-started/introduction.description: Unity's most powerful visual animation system that lets you create complex, professional animations without writing a single line of code.

getting-started/overview.title: Overview
getting-started/overview.description: Welcome to Animatix Pro - the professional animation system for Unity that revolutionizes how you create stunning UI and camera animations.

getting-started/project-setup.description: Configure your Unity project for optimal Animatix Pro performance and workflow. This guide covers project settings, folder structure, and best practices.

getting-started/quick-start.description: Create your first animation in under 5 minutes with this step-by-step guide.
